Brief History of Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Activities Introduced in Romania
   Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A brief history of Kim Jong Il's revolutionary activities was introduced by the Romanian preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 in its information bulletin on February 4.

Boletin impreso en Rumania presenta biografia de Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Comite Preparatorio de Rumania para el Dia del Sol (15 de abril, cumpleanos del Presidente Kim Il Sung) y el 16 de febrero (cumpleanos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il) inserto el dia 4 en un boletin la breve biografia de actividades revolucionarias del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
